page.title: 20From the Hill Middle School
page.content: At 6.50 a.m I get up and get quietly ready for school.At 8 o'clock I pack my bag for a Tuesday,then off to catch the bus.This bus will take me for free straight to school, as long as I carry my pass.On the bus I sit on the back seat,where we joke on the way to school.Tuesday's a good day for my class; having lessons like P.E.and Metalwork.First,we're registered by our form tutor and then to year assembly.After this it's lessons,each one lasting 35 minutes.In P.E.we do cricket and athletics in the summer, and football and rugby in the winter. Everyone enjoys these lessons and we shower at the end of them.At lunch time there's a canteen for cooked dinners or you can bring sandwiches. Lunchtime lasts 50 minutes. We return home by bus.At home I do my homework.
